---
title: "Batch Call"
api: "POST /initiateBatchCall"  
description: "Call multiple contacts at once with JSON payload (up to 1000 contacts)"
---

<img
  className="block dark:hidden"
  src="/images/batch-light.svg"
  alt="Batch Call API"
/>
<img
  className="hidden dark:block"
  src="/images/batch-dark.svg"
  alt="Batch Call API"
/>

## Quick Start

Need to call multiple people? This endpoint lets you initiate up to **1000 calls** in a single request. Perfect for campaigns, notifications, or bulk outreach.

<CardGroup cols={3}>
  <Card
    title="Up to 1000"
    icon="users"
  >
    Call up to 1000 contacts in one request
  </Card>
  <Card
    title="Personalized"
    icon="bullseye"
  >
    Each contact gets custom metadata
  </Card>
  <Card
    title="Real-time"
    icon="chart-line"
  >
    Get instant batch processing status
  </Card>
</CardGroup>

---

## Authentication

<Note>
  **Recommended:** Use a **Static Batch Token** for integrations - it never expires! Contact support to get yours.
</Note>

---

## Headers

<ParamField header="Content-Type" type="string" required>
  application/json
</ParamField>

<ParamField header="Authorization" type="string" required>
  Bearer token for authentication
  
  **Options:**
  - Regular JWT token: `Bearer <JWT_TOKEN>` (from login response)
  - Static batch token: `Bearer <BATCH_STATIC_TOKEN>` (never expires - contact support)
</ParamField>

<ParamField header="Cookie" type="string">
  Alternative authentication via cookie: `token=<JWT_TOKEN>`
  
  Use this if not using Authorization header
</ParamField>

<ParamField header="Origin" type="string" required>
  Origin of the request (must be whitelisted)
  
  Example: `https://seamless-sandbox-dev-cmdash.oriserve.com`
</ParamField>

<ParamField header="User-Agent" type="string">
  Browser or client user agent
</ParamField>

---

## Request Body

<ParamField body="campaignId" type="string" required>
  **Campaign ID** - Links all calls to a specific campaign
  
  <CodeGroup>
  ```json Example
  "b885b212-d3bb-482f-a29d-508d2a8929ac"
  ```
  </CodeGroup>
</ParamField>

<ParamField body="notificationWebhookUrl" type="string">
  **Webhook URL** - Get batch processing updates *(optional)*
  
  <CodeGroup>
  ```json Example
  "https://your-webhook.com/batch-updates"
  ```
  </CodeGroup>
  
  We'll POST batch status and individual call updates
</ParamField>

<ParamField body="users" type="array" required>
  **Users Array** - List of contacts to call (max 1000)
  
  <CodeGroup>
  ```json Single User Example
  [
    {
      "userName": "Faiz Ahmed",
      "userPhoneNumber": "919625147093",
      "metaData": {
        "due_amount": "4500",
        "due_date": "2025-09-03",
        "company_name": "H-D-B financial services",
        "loan_id": "1234",
        "customer_id": "CUST_001"
      }
    }
  ]
  ```
  
  ```json Multiple Users - Global Examples
  [
    {
      "userName": "Faiz Ahmed",
      "userPhoneNumber": "919625147093",
      "metaData": {
        "due_amount": "4500",
        "due_date": "2025-09-03",
        "company_name": "H-D-B financial services",
        "loan_id": "1234"
      }
    },
    {
      "userName": "John Smith",
      "userPhoneNumber": "14155551234",
      "metaData": {
        "due_amount": "3000",
        "due_date": "2025-10-15",
        "company_name": "ABC Corp USA",
        "loan_id": "5678"
      }
    },
    {
      "userName": "Sarah Johnson",
      "userPhoneNumber": "447700123456",
      "metaData": {
        "due_amount": "5500",
        "due_date": "2025-11-20",
        "company_name": "XYZ Ltd UK",
        "loan_id": "9012"
      }
    },
    {
      "userName": "Ahmed Al-Rashid",
      "userPhoneNumber": "971501234567",
      "metaData": {
        "due_amount": "7200",
        "due_date": "2025-12-05",
        "company_name": "Emirates Finance",
        "loan_id": "3456"
      }
    }
  ]
  ```
  </CodeGroup>
  
  **Each user object contains:**
  - `userName` - Contact's full name (required)
  - `userPhoneNumber` - Phone number with country code (no + prefix, required)
  - `metaData` - Custom data object for AI agent (optional)
  
  <Info>
    **Phone Number Format:**
    - **India:** `919625147093` (91 + 10 digits)
    - **USA/Canada:** `14155551234` (1 + 10 digits)  
    - **UK:** `447700123456` (44 + 7700123456)
    - **UAE:** `971501234567` (971 + 9 digits)
    - **Always include country code, never use + prefix**
  </Info>
  
  <Warning>
    **Limit:** Maximum 1000 users per request. For larger lists, use the [file upload endpoint](/api-reference/third-party/initiate-batch-call-using-sheet).
  </Warning>
</ParamField>

### Request Body Example

```json
{
  "campaignId": "b885b212-d3bb-482f-a29d-508d2a8929ac",
  "notificationWebhookUrl": "https://your-webhook.ngrok-free.app/batch-callback",
  "users": [
    {
      "userName": "Faiz Ahmed",
      "userPhoneNumber": "919625147093",
      "metaData": {
        "due_amount": "4500",
        "due_date": "2025-09-03",
        "company_name": "H-D-B financial services",
        "loan_id": "1234"
      }
    },
    {
      "userName": "John Smith", 
      "userPhoneNumber": "14155551234",
      "metaData": {
        "due_amount": "3000",
        "due_date": "2025-10-15",
        "company_name": "ABC Corp USA",
        "loan_id": "5678"
      }
    }
  ]
}
```

---

## Response

<Tabs>
  <Tab title="Success">
    **Batch processing started successfully!**
    
    <CodeGroup>
    ```json 200 OK - Single User
    {
      "success": true,
      "message": "Batch call initiated successfully",
      "data": {
        "total_users": 1,
        "calls_initiated": 1,
        "calls_failed": 0,
        "batch_id": "batch_abc123",
        "calls": [
          {
            "call_uuid": "call-uuid-001",
            "userName": "Faiz Ahmed",
            "userPhoneNumber": "919625147093",
            "status": "initiated"
          }
        ]
      }
    }
    ```
    
    ```json 200 OK - Multiple Users
    {
      "success": true,
      "message": "Batch call initiated successfully",
      "data": {
        "total_users": 4,
        "calls_initiated": 3,
        "calls_failed": 1,
        "batch_id": "batch_xyz789",
        "calls": [
          {
            "call_uuid": "call-uuid-001",
            "userName": "Faiz Ahmed",
            "userPhoneNumber": "919625147093",
            "status": "initiated"
          },
          {
            "call_uuid": "call-uuid-002", 
            "userName": "John Smith",
            "userPhoneNumber": "14155551234",
            "status": "initiated"
          },
          {
            "call_uuid": "call-uuid-003",
            "userName": "Sarah Johnson", 
            "userPhoneNumber": "447700123456",
            "status": "initiated"
          },
          {
            "call_uuid": null,
            "userName": "Invalid User",
            "userPhoneNumber": "invalid_number",
            "status": "failed",
            "error": "Invalid phone number format"
          }
        ]
      }
    }
    ```
    </CodeGroup>
    
    **Key Fields:**
    - **total_users** - Number of users in your request
    - **calls_initiated** - Successfully started calls  
    - **calls_failed** - Failed calls (invalid numbers, etc.)
    - **batch_id** - Track this batch in webhooks/analytics
    - **calls** - Individual call details with UUIDs for tracking
    
  </Tab>
  <Tab title="Error">
    **Something went wrong:**
    
    <CodeGroup>
    ```json 400 - Invalid Users Array
    {
      "success": false,
      "message": "Invalid users array",
      "error": "Users array cannot be empty"
    }
    ```
    
    ```json 400 - Invalid Phone Number
    {
      "success": false,
      "message": "Invalid phone number format",
      "error": "Phone number '91962514709' is invalid. Must be 10-15 digits with country code (no + prefix)"
    }
    ```
    
    ```json 413 - Too Many Users
    {
      "success": false,
      "message": "Too many users",
      "error": "Maximum 1000 users allowed per batch"
    }
    ```
    
    ```json 401 - Authentication Failed
    {
      "success": false,
      "message": "Authentication failed", 
      "error": "Invalid or expired token"
    }
    ```
    
    ```json 422 - Validation Error
    {
      "success": false,
      "message": "Validation failed",
      "error": "Missing required field: userName for user at index 2"
    }
    ```
    </CodeGroup>
    
  </Tab>
</Tabs>

---

## Phone Number Validation

<CardGroup cols={2}>
  <Card title="Valid Formats" icon="check">
    **Correct Examples:**
    - `919625147093` (India)
    - `14155551234` (USA/Canada) 
    - `447700123456` (UK)
    - `971501234567` (UAE)
    - `33123456789` (France)
    - `61423456789` (Australia)
  </Card>
  
  <Card title="Invalid Formats" icon="x">
    **Incorrect Examples:**
    - `+919625147093` (has + prefix)
    - `9625147093` (missing country code)
    - `91-962-514-7093` (has dashes)
    - `91 962 514 7093` (has spaces)
    - `abc123456789` (contains letters)
  </Card>
</CardGroup>

<Note>
  **Pro Tip:** Always include the country code without the + prefix. The system will automatically validate and format the number for optimal delivery rates.
</Note>

---

## Code Examples

<CodeGroup>
```bash cURL
curl -X POST "https://vb-seamless-dev-backend.oriserve.com/initiateBatchCall" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE" \
  -H "Origin: https://your-domain.com" \
  -d '{
    "campaignId": "b885b212-d3bb-482f-a29d-508d2a8929ac",
    "notificationWebhookUrl": "https://your-webhook.ngrok-free.app/batch-callback",
    "users": [
      {
        "userName": "Faiz Ahmed",
        "userPhoneNumber": "919625147093",
        "metaData": {
          "due_amount": "4500",
          "due_amount_half": "2250",
          "due_date": "2025-09-03",
          "allocation_month": "2025-09-01",
          "company_name": "H-D-B financial services",
          "loan_id": "1234",
          "company_id": "23332000",
          "communication_level": "applicant",
          "product_description": "two wheeler loan"
        }
      },
      {
        "userName": "John Smith", 
        "userPhoneNumber": "14155551234",
        "metaData": {
          "due_amount": "3000",
          "due_date": "2025-10-15",
          "company_name": "ABC Corp USA",
          "loan_id": "5678",
          "communication_level": "primary"
        }
      }
    ]
  }'
```

```javascript JavaScript/Node.js
const axios = require('axios');

async function initiateBatchCall(campaignId, users, notificationWebhookUrl = null) {
  try {
    const payload = {
      campaignId: campaignId,
      users: users
    };
    
    if (notificationWebhookUrl) {
      payload.notificationWebhookUrl = notificationWebhookUrl;
    }
    
    const response = await axios.post(
      'https://vb-seamless-dev-backend.oriserve.com/initiateBatchCall',
      payload,
      {
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
          'Authorization': 'Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE',
          'Origin': 'https://your-domain.com'
        }
      }
    );
    
    console.log(`${response.data.data.calls_initiated} calls initiated successfully`);
    console.log(`Batch ID: ${response.data.data.batch_id}`);
    
    return response.data.data;
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Batch call failed:', error.response?.data || error.message);
    throw error;
  }
}

// Example usage with multiple international numbers
const users = [
  {
    userName: "Faiz Ahmed",
    userPhoneNumber: "919625147093", // India
    metaData: {
      "due_amount": "4500",
      "due_date": "2025-09-03",
      "company_name": "H-D-B financial services",
      "loan_id": "1234"
    }
  },
  {
    userName: "John Smith",
    userPhoneNumber: "14155551234", // USA
    metaData: {
      "due_amount": "3000", 
      "due_date": "2025-10-15",
      "company_name": "ABC Corp USA",
      "loan_id": "5678"
    }
  },
  {
    userName: "Sarah Johnson",
    userPhoneNumber: "447700123456", // UK
    metaData: {
      "due_amount": "5500",
      "due_date": "2025-11-20", 
      "company_name": "XYZ Ltd UK",
      "loan_id": "9012"
    }
  }
];

// Execute batch call
initiateBatchCall(
  'b885b212-d3bb-482f-a29d-508d2a8929ac',
  users,
  'https://your-webhook.ngrok-free.app/batch-callback'
);
```

```python Python
import requests
import json

def initiate_batch_call(campaign_id, users, notification_webhook_url=None):
    """
    Initiate batch calls to multiple contacts
    
    Args:
        campaign_id (str): Campaign ID to link calls
        users (list): List of user objects with phone numbers and metadata
        notification_webhook_url (str, optional): Webhook URL for batch updates
    
    Returns:
        dict: Response with batch details and call statuses
    """
    
    url = "https://vb-seamless-dev-backend.oriserve.com/initiateBatchCall"
    
    payload = {
        "campaignId": campaign_id,
        "users": users
    }
    
    if notification_webhook_url:
        payload["notificationWebhookUrl"] = notification_webhook_url
    
    headers = {
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        "Authorization": "Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE",
        "Origin": "https://your-domain.com"
    }
    
    try:
        response = requests.post(url, json=payload, headers=headers)
        response.raise_for_status()
        
        result = response.json()
        print(f"{result['data']['calls_initiated']} calls initiated successfully")
        print(f"Batch ID: {result['data']['batch_id']}")
        
        return result['data']
        
    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:
        print(f"Batch call failed: {e}")
        if hasattr(e, 'response') and e.response is not None:
            print(f"Error details: {e.response.text}")
        raise

# Example usage
users = [
    {
        "userName": "Faiz Ahmed", 
        "userPhoneNumber": "919625147093",  # India
        "metaData": {
            "due_amount": "4500",
            "due_date": "2025-09-03",
            "company_name": "H-D-B financial services",
            "loan_id": "1234"
        }
    },
    {
        "userName": "Ahmed Al-Rashid",
        "userPhoneNumber": "971501234567",  # UAE
        "metaData": {
            "due_amount": "7200",
            "due_date": "2025-12-05", 
            "company_name": "Emirates Finance",
            "loan_id": "3456"
        }
    }
]

# Execute batch call
result = initiate_batch_call(
    campaign_id="b885b212-d3bb-482f-a29d-508d2a8929ac",
    users=users,
    notification_webhook_url="https://your-webhook.ngrok-free.app/batch-callback"
)
```

```php PHP
<?php

function initiateBatchCall($campaignId, $users, $notificationWebhookUrl = null) {
    $url = "https://vb-seamless-dev-backend.oriserve.com/initiateBatchCall";
    
    $payload = [
        "campaignId" => $campaignId,
        "users" => $users
    ];
    
    if ($notificationWebhookUrl) {
        $payload["notificationWebhookUrl"] = $notificationWebhookUrl;
    }
    
    $headers = [
        "Content-Type: application/json",
        "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE",
        "Origin: https://your-domain.com"
    ];
    
    $ch = curl_init();
    curl_setopt_array($ch, [
        CURLOPT_URL => $url,
        CURLOPT_POST => true,
        CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => json_encode($payload),
        CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => $headers,
        CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
        CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER => false
    ]);
    
    $response = curl_exec($ch);
    $httpCode = curl_getinfo($ch, CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE);
    curl_close($ch);
    
    if ($httpCode === 200) {
        $result = json_decode($response, true);
        echo "{$result['data']['calls_initiated']} calls initiated successfully\n";
        echo "Batch ID: {$result['data']['batch_id']}\n";
        return $result['data'];
    } else {
        echo "Batch call failed: HTTP $httpCode\n";
        echo "Response: $response\n";
        return false;
    }
}

// Example usage with international numbers
$users = [
    [
        "userName" => "Faiz Ahmed",
        "userPhoneNumber" => "919625147093", // India
        "metaData" => [
            "due_amount" => "4500",
            "due_date" => "2025-09-03",
            "company_name" => "H-D-B financial services",
            "loan_id" => "1234"
        ]
    ],
    [
        "userName" => "Sarah Johnson", 
        "userPhoneNumber" => "447700123456", // UK
        "metaData" => [
            "due_amount" => "5500",
            "due_date" => "2025-11-20",
            "company_name" => "XYZ Ltd UK", 
            "loan_id" => "9012"
        ]
    ]
];

// Execute batch call
$result = initiateBatchCall(
    "b885b212-d3bb-482f-a29d-508d2a8929ac",
    $users,
    "https://your-webhook.ngrok-free.app/batch-callback"
);
?>
```
</CodeGroup>

---

## Best Practices

<AccordionGroup>
  <Accordion title="Phone Number Optimization" icon="phone">
    - **Always include country code** (91 for India, 1 for USA/Canada, etc.)
    - **Remove all formatting** (no spaces, dashes, or parentheses)
    - **Never use + prefix** - the system handles international dialing
    - **Validate before sending** to reduce failed calls and improve success rates
  </Accordion>

  <Accordion title="Batch Size Optimization" icon="layer-group">
    - **Small batches (10-50):** Better for testing and immediate feedback
    - **Medium batches (100-500):** Ideal for regular campaigns
    - **Large batches (500-1000):** Best for major outreach campaigns
    - **Monitor webhook responses** to track batch processing status
  </Accordion>

  <Accordion title="Error Handling" icon="triangle-exclamation">
    - **Check response status** - partial success is possible
    - **Parse individual call results** for specific failure reasons
    - **Retry failed calls** with corrected phone numbers
    - **Use webhook notifications** for real-time status updates
  </Accordion>

  <Accordion title="Performance Tips" icon="rocket">
    - **Use Static Batch Tokens** for production (never expire)
    - **Implement exponential backoff** for rate limiting
    - **Set up webhook endpoints** to avoid polling for status
    - **Cache campaign IDs** to avoid repeated lookups
  </Accordion>
</AccordionGroup>

---
